title: disconnected from chat !! i need help to fix this !!
body: so i can enter a game and play but i can't add friends or talk to them can't talk to my team but who does that any way the problem here is i can't add friends and can't chat with them

replies.body: There are different services you're navigating through while using the client.  It looks like your network is specifically having some issues reaching pvp.net, even though it may be bale to use other features.  For this, your best bet may be to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out whatever is causing that block.  You can also use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure your firewall settings.  I hope that helps!
